name: All About 'The Brady Bunch' Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the occupation of Alice's boyfriend Sam?
Who did Bobby write a school report on naming him his hero?
questions.explanation:
Jesse James.

	It was Jesse James and he got in trouble at school because he wrote a paper about him

questions.text: What was the cousin's name that came to live with the Brady's?
What were the names of Cindy's pet rabbits?
Whose fan club was Marcia the President of?
Who played Zaccariah, the guy who locks up the Brady's when they go to the Grand Canyon?
What color did Greg's hair turned when he used hair tonic that he bought from Bobby?
What Laundry Detergent did the Brady's do a commercial for?
What was Carol Brady's name before marrying Mr Brady?
